This app is anything BUT great. 
Make the App Store great again by taking this horrendous use of code off of it please.
attributes.title: Holy guac, This app is anything BUT great.

attributes.review: This app is seriously the worst. When I downloaded the app, I saw a Cheeto puff with eyes and then threw up multiple times. My throw up ended up attracting billions of ants which ended up overrunning and kicking me out of my own house. While on the streets I befriended a beetle named Ferdinand. One night while I was sleeping Ferdinand stole the rest of my personal belongings and then literally stabbed me in the back. I walked to the nearest hospital with the knife still in my back, and the doctors said that I needed surgery to live. The surgery took two weeks and I ran out of vacation days so I got fired from my job. The surgery also put me in tremendous debt. Here I am two years later still homeless with a phone that cost me $30. 0/10 two thumbs down ğŸ˜¾
attributes.title: This app made me homeless

attributes.review: You open the app to see a offensive picture of a very terrible man.This app is basically propaganda.Its just like the news outlets and ads.They are all set up by the government to spread a opinion to make cultures,races,and etc. look bad or good.Would never recommend to install this app.Do not get your opinion changed by the influence of propaganda.
attributes.title: Horrific
